name: Ghoul Smash [DEMO]
description:
My name is Troy,  and I am 28 years old. I spend most of my free time gaming, being a dungeon master for a Dungeons and Dragons Campaign and occasionally writing articles. I have always wanted to create a game and publish it somewhere, and this project will be my leap towards that goal.

Beginners Guide

Activate your Skills! Every weapon (and some items) have skills attached to them. To activate the skill click the box that appears next to their respective item slot when it is equipped. An active skill will be red. Every skill costs 1 Spirit and the cost will be used when you start your turn.

Allocate Skillpoints! Under the attributes section there will be a emblem which indicates the amount of skillpoints you have. A skillpoint can be allocated into either Strength, Dexterity, or Intelligence (red, green, and blue orbs respectively) attributes. Skillpoints can be refunded for free infinitely by clicking the skillpoint emblem.

Abuse the Shop! Every time you successfully complete a map the shopkeeper will re-roll the three offered items for free. You can also sell items by going to the Salvage Tab. Additionally, you can upgrade the shop tier by highlighting the shop tier indicator in the Purchase tab. Higher shop tiers equals higher quality items offered.

Farm! Don't be afraid to stick to an easier map to gather more experience and salvage to prepare for the harder maps. The game is punishing for those who aren't prepared for what lies ahead.

Crafting Recipes! There are many crafting recipes, all of which are hidden and subject to experimentation. To get you started, try combing four of the same type of ring together.

Discord

To get the latest news about Ghoul Smash and to find like-minded smashers, join the discord at this link: https://discord.gg/tHCpQG3cKn

Freesync / Gsync

There have been reports of game slowdowns and potential frame losses due to this, namely Gsync. Ensure that you have this feature disabled when playing.
